message.content:
cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a method to improve the performance of automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems in noisy environments. This involves using a generative adversarial net (GAN) and neural network-based acoustic model (AM) in a jointly compositional scheme. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the following arXiv CS sub-categories: 

- cs.SD (Sound)
- cs.CL (Computation and Language)
- cs.LG (Machine Learning)
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence)
- cs.CV (Computer Vision)
